content.text:
HON. JOHN K. DELANEY

                              of maryland

                    in the house of representatives

                       Tuesday, November 14, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mr. DELANEY. Mr. Speaker, I was unable to cast my vote on Roll Call 
No. 623, No. 624,


and No. 625. Had I been present, on Roll Call No. 623, I would have 
voted `YEA'; on Roll Call No. 624, I would have voted `YEA'; and on 
Roll Call No. 625, I would have voted `NAY'.
content.speaker: Mr. DELANEY
